Scripts.OnLoad:
this:SetFrameLevel(this:GetFrameLevel() + 1);
this.Number = tonumber(string.sub(this:GetName(), string.len(this:GetName())-1)) -- assuming 2 digits if not this.Number then this.Number = tonumber(string.sub(this:GetName(), string.len(this:GetName()))) -- assuming one digit end
Scripts.OnMouseWheel: local scrollbar = getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."ScrollFrameScrollBar") local scrollbarupbutton = getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."ScrollFrameScrollBarScrollUpButton") local scrollbardownbutton = getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."ScrollFrameScrollBarScrollDownButton") if not scrollbar:IsVisible() then elseif arg1 > 0 then -- up,down = 1,-1 local parent = scrollbarupbutton:GetParent() parent:SetValue(parent:GetValue() - 1) PlaySound("UChatScrollButton") else local parent = scrollbardownbutton:GetParent() parent:SetValue(parent:GetValue() + 1) PlaySound("UChatScrollButton") end Outfitter:ListButton_OnLeave(this) Outfitter:ListButton_OnEnter(this)

Scripts.OnLoad: this.SavedHeight = this:GetHeight() this.ChangedValueFunc = Outfitter.OutfitItemSelected this.initialize = Outfitter.ItemDropDown_Initialize
